sentences.english: As a kid, he burned off energy outdoors catching snakes and turtles.
sentences.chinese: 孩童时期，他就爱在野外撒欢，抓蛇，捕乌龟。

sentences.english: And ask every child I know.
Children as young as two toddle in and climb the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 两岁左右的孩童蹒跚地走进教室，攀爬楼梯。

sentences.english: For the map carvers, you are clearing the road for the ascending children.
sentences.chinese: 对地图绘制者而言，你正在为提升孩童净化道路。

sentences.english: While learning Chinese characters, children's intelligence develops without being noticed.
sentences.chinese: 在学习汉字的过程中，孩童们的智商也无形中提高了。

sentences.english: Democracy is when all of God's children sing together.
sentences.chinese: 孩童齐声歌唱时，民主即在其中。

sentences.english: Youths oppress my people, women rule over them.
sentences.chinese: 至于我的百姓，孩童欺压他们，妇女辖管他们。

sentences.english: Even so we, when we were children, were in bondage under the elements of the world
sentences.chinese: 我们为孩童的时候，受管于世俗小学之下，也是如此。

sentences.english: In mythical broken Britain, children are especially at risk.
sentences.chinese: 在英国崩溃传说中，孩童们位于极度危险之中。

sentences.english: Even as a child he showed an unusual aptitude for mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 甚至孩童时他就显露出非统一般的数学才能。

sentences.english: Wong Tsz Mei's interest in painting started at her childhood .
sentences.chinese: 王梓溦自孩童时期已爱好绘画。

sentences.english: Foolishness is bound in the heart of a child; but the rod of correction shall drive it far from him.
sentences.chinese: 愚蒙迷住孩童的心，用管教的杖可以远远赶除。

sentences.english: The huge eyes of the children follow
sentences.chinese: 孩童们把眼睛瞪得大大的，目光始终跟随着他。

sentences.english: They took the young men to grind, and the children fell under the wood.
sentences.chinese: 少年人扛磨石，孩童背木柴，都绊跌了。

sentences.english: You will have a childlike approach this week, big hearted and full of spunk.
sentences.chinese: 本周你有孩童般的心，博爱，精力充沛。

sentences.english: The backstage activities are a mysterious world for this youngster.
sentences.chinese: 彩楼背后的戏棚是孩童攀爬窥探的神秘世界。

definition: still possessing the innocence of childhood (idiom)
